args: if command -v strayfiles >/dev/null 2>&1; then exec strayfiles mcp; elif [ -x "$HOME/.strayfiles/bin/strayfiles" ]; then exec "$HOME/.strayfiles/bin/strayfiles" mcp; elif [ -x "$HOME/.local/bin/strayfiles" ]; then exec "$HOME/.local/bin/strayfiles" mcp; else echo 'strayfiles binary not found. Install: curl -fsSL https://strayfiles.com/install.sh | sh' >&2; exit 1; fi
